scripts.db:start: . ./.env && . ./.env.local && SURREAL_INSECURE_FORWARD_SCOPE_ERRORS=true surreal start --log trace -A --auth --user root --pass root --bind 0.0.0.0:$DB_PORT file:///${HOME}/data/db
scripts.db:export: . ./.env && . ./.env.local && surreal export --conn http://localhost:$DB_PORT --user root --pass root --ns $DB_NS --db $DB_DB dump.sql
scripts.db:import: . ./.env && . ./.env.local && surreal import --conn http://localhost:$DB_PORT --user root --pass root --ns $DB_NS --db $DB_DB dump.sql
scripts.win:db:start: call ./.env.bat && call ./.env.local.bat && call surreal start --log trace --user root --pass root --bind 0.0.0.0:%DB_PORT% file:///data/db
scripts.win:db:console: call ./.env.bat && call ./.env.local.bat && call surreal sql --conn http://localhost:%DB_PORT% --user root --pass root --ns %DB_NS% --db %DB_DB% --pretty
scripts.win:db:export: call ./.env.bat && call ./.env.local.bat && call surreal export --conn http://localhost:%DB_PORT% --user root --pass root --ns %DB_NS% --db %DB_DB% dump.sql
